The play "Rafjat Rafiji"
22  May,  2024
In partnership with Best Buddies – Qatar and Abu Obaida Preparatory School for Boys
,
they organize the Rafjat Rafiji play competition
,
which is concerned with integrating people with disabilities and their partners
,
encouraging them to
social activities
and promoting effective communication as friends and as a team in society
,
where five schools participated
,
a training workshop was held for coordinators and a jury was formed to determine the winners
,
and the play was characterized by the presence and interaction of the aud
ience.
